arts.ttl: Viva Las Vegas: Mallorca's drugs supermarket
arts.sum: This perhaps gives as a hint as to why there is now the large neon sign, Son Banya at night being illuminated with LED lighting in the sales area . One of the clans' bosses is El Vito, whose name comes from 'The Godfather'; the Corleones ran casinos in Las Vegas.
Porreres (8C) 17C, moderate northeast breeze easing to gentle; humidity 75%. Andratx (9C) 17C, light northeast breeze; humidity 60%.

arts.ttl: Athletic Club star to miss Mallorca clash through suspension
arts.sum: Athletic Club are set to be without an important member of their midfield setup for the club’s next outing. The player in question? Iñigo Ruiz de Galarreta. Athletic marked their…

arts.ttl: The beaches that Mallorca's residents most avoid in summer
arts.sum: A research project by Sergio Obrador of the Demographic and Tourism Studies Group at the University of the Balearic Islands surveyed Mallorca residents on the effects of overcrowding on mobility . Sa Calobra and Caló des Moro both also have access issues, and in the case of the latter it became a symbol last summer of protests against overcrowding.

Mallorca enter this fixture with aspirations of European qualification, currently sat in eighth, level on points with Rayo Vallecano in sixth. Currently unbeaten in three La Liga games, Mallorca could...

arts.ttl: Bones of missing woman found at Mallorca waste plant
arts.sum: After going out with some friends, the young woman is thought to have climbed into or fallen into a rubbish container where, after losing consciousness, she was taken by a waste collection lorry to the Son Reus treatment plant, according to the investigation by the Homicide Squad. The National Police confirmed on Friday that bones found at a waste treatment plant in Palma belong to Agostina Rubini, the 24-year-old Argentine woman who went missing on the night of 2 October in Palma.
